@sarahvrose the last thing to try is Incognito Window. There are no sessions or caching in incognito

@stefanbc I want Allo to be the iMessage for android. Default installed. SMS when needed. Multiple platforms. But yeah, updates could come!
@stefanbc @google I have all those too! But the ones I listed are all the same company. I just want to google to have an iMessage clone 😩
@stefanbc @google yeah same. But I have messenger (SMS), hangouts, duo, and now allo. I would prefer a more unified experience
I've been waiting for @google allo for a while. It's cool. But no SMS merging is bad. Another chat app in my menu that becomes lost
